item.description:
Join us for a unique evening of feasting for all the senses....

This venue provides for dining experiences on Friday and Saturday nights, where groups enjoy the amazing party atmosphere, the live house band and the spectacular Belly Dance show. Prices start at just $35 per person and include a multi-course dinner, coffee and dessert (tax, gratuity and liquor additional).

Please join us for what promises to be an amazing evening...

I just reserved the table for 25 people, it's under Ivone or "The Fun Singles". I might have the opportunity to add people to our reservation, so please put yourself on the waiting list if you would like to go and it is already full.

They can't give us separate checks, so please bring cash with you to make it easier to settle the bill at the end of the evening.
item.how_to_find_us: Just let them know that your joining the Ivone or "The Fun Singles" party.
item.name: Unique Dining - Karoun Restaurant and Belling Dancing
